songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
And I ain't gotta drive tonight
Called a Uber to the party tonight
Who feelin’ like a thottie tonight?
She about to catch a body tonight
You ain't tryna fuck, who you tryna convince
Niggas tryna pay, bitches gotta pay rent
All that cockblockin', what you trying to prevent?
All these bottles, we ain’t makin' a dent

[Chorus]
Gas tank on E, but all dranks on me (Ayy)
All dranks on me
Yeah the top lonely but I'm rollin' low key
All dranks on me 'cause I'm B.o.B

[Verse 2]
Ayy this shit is a banger
I'm woke, but all I know is strippers and gangsters
I delivered Topanga
All that hatin', you just building up anger
If you ain’t throwin’ them knees up
Don't smoke my weed up or drink my drink up
Tell the DJ to turn up the speakers
I’m throwin' ten racks, niggas tryna keep up

[Chorus]
Gas tank on E but all dranks on me (Ayy)
All dranks on me
Yeah the top lonely but I'm rollin' low key
All dranks on me ’cause I'm B.o.B

[Verse 3]
She looking at all of this ice (Uh)
Don't be caught in the hype
You about to catch a body tonight
It can happen in my bed but I'm the ottoman type (Ha)
This the lottery life
I got a woman but we got us a wife
The type of nigga that you gotta invite (Uh)
With some verses that you gotta recite

[Chorus]
Gas tank on E but all dranks on me (Ayy)
All dranks on me
Yeah the top lonely but I'm rollin' low key
All dranks on me 'cause I'm B.o.B (Ayy)

[Verse 4]
I'm a dog ass nigga, I'm Anubis
Gotta clean the weed smoke off my Cuban
Fuck around and pick up the acoustic
I let her rock the mic, she said it's therapeutic (Ha)
Light it and puff
We just thuggin', we ain't wifein' 'em up
You be gripin' and such
She with us 'cause you ain't pipin' her up

[Chorus]
Gas tank on E but all dranks on me (Ayy)
All dranks on me
Yeah the top lonely but I'm rollin' low key
All dranks on me 'cause I'm B.o.B

[Outro]
'Cause I'm, 'cause I'm B.o.B
songs.title: Drinks On Me
